name: Highest Sum of Increasing Sequence with Same Jump
description:
# Highest Sum of Increasing Sequence with Same Jump

Given an array of size **N**, you must return the greatest sum of all increasing sequences with the same jump inbetween each number.

For example given the array `[68,71,93,43,73,13,25,96,83,37]`.  
The longest increasing sequences with the same jump are  
`[68,71,93]` with a jump of **1** and a sum of **232**,  
`[13,25,96]` with a jump of **1** and a sum of **134** and  
`[71,73,96]` with a jump of **3** and a sum of **240**.  
so you would return **240** as that is the largest sum of the 3

given the array `[0,13,28,73,66,57,49,2,48,25]`.  
The longest increasing sequence with the same jump is `[0,13,28,73]` with a jump of **1**  
So the sum of this would be **114**  
So you would return **114**

**For an extra challenge:** try and keep space complexity under O(n) and time complexity under O(n^2)
